import { IPagination, IRequestContext } from '@server/Application';

export interface IGet{{DomainName}} extends IRequestContext {
  input?: {
    name?: string;
  } & IPagination;
}

export interface IRegister{{EntityName}} extends IRequestContext {
  input: {
    // Add your entity properties here
  };
}

export interface IGet{{EntityName}} extends IRequestContext {
  input: number; // {{entityNameLower}} id
}

export interface IValidate{{EntityName}} extends IRequestContext {
  input: {
    id?: number;
    // Add other validation fields
  };
}

export interface IUpdate{{EntityName}} extends IRequestContext {
  input: {
    id: number;
    // Add your update properties here
  };
}

export interface IDelete{{EntityName}} extends IRequestContext {
  input: number; // {{EntityName}} Id
}

export interface I{{EntityName}} {
  id?: number;
  // Add your entity properties here
}
